articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Huawei aims to double smartphone shipments to 70m next year - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: New export controls expected from U.S. could thwart ambitious comeback plans
articles.content:
TAIPEI -- Huawei has been stockpiling components for months as it aims to double its smartphone sales next year despite expectations of a further U.S. crackdown.
Huawei's goal is to ship between 60 … [+334 chars]
